div.p: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the scope of data sent from a primary source of validated data to a validated healthcare directory when there is a push model (from the sender) for sending data.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation
CodeDisplay
specificSpecific requested changesThe sender will send specific changes to the healthcare directory as determined by agreement.
anyAny changesThe sender will send all changes to the healthcare directory.
sourcedefAs defined by the source/senderThe sender will only send changes they have determined to be significant.
